snippet.title: Catcha Snatcha - VIC-20 Gameplay (Steam re-release)
snippet.description:
Originally released in 1983, this game for the Commodore VIC-20 from prolific developers Imagine saw players take on the role of busy store detective Barney Bootlace.

Appease the shop manager by running around the shop floor dealing with various problems: returning dropped items to the lost property office, guiding lost children back to their parents, busting shoplifters before they get away, or even deal with planted bombs!

The gameplay is from the Steam re-release by Pixel Games UK

Developed by Imagine
Steam re-release by Pixel Games UK
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2434080/Catcha_Snatcha/

#steam #steamgames #steamgame #retrogames #retrogaming #commodorevic20 #vic20 #commodore #pixelgamesuk #vic20games #commodorevic20games #imagine #pixelgamesuk #catchasnatcha
